tgt_original: ūrdhve trināḍī kāyavākcittadharmiṇī |  evam adhaś ca |
tatra vāme candranāḍī kāyadharmiṇī |  dakṣiṇe'rkanāḍī vāgdharmiṇī |
viḍnāḍī kāyadharmiṇī |  mutranāḍī vāgdharmiṇī |  śukranāḍī cittadharmiṇī |  candranāḍī toyasvabhāvā |  arkanāḍī vahnisvabhāvā |
śukranāḍī jñānasvabhāvā | (44)
prāṇe'pāne krameṇa tā iti |
prāṇe candrasūryataminyaḥ |  apāne cāvaśiṣṭāḥ |

vibhoḥ śukradhātoḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāveneti viṣamakulāliṅganena |  prajñāṅgabhāvo hy upāye bhavati suratakāle cittasya tadākāratvāt |  upāyāṅgabhāvaḥ prajñāyām apy evam |  ariṣṭam akālamaraṇalakṣaṇam adhikamārutair bhavati |
ūrdhve'dhaś ca kayor ity āha |
kāyavāgnāḍyor yathāyogaṃ lalanārasanayoḥ |
taminīśukravāhiṇyoś cāriṣṭaṃ nāsti |
taminīśukravāhiṇyor māruta utpattir garbhād nirgamaḥ |  maraṇaṃ sthitiḥ svasthitā |
anyacakṣurbhyāṃ paśyatīty api nety āha |
na paśyatītyādi |  svacakṣurbhyām ityādi |
kumāryā yad dṛśyamānam ajātam anutpannaṃ tat tasyā jātakaṃ yathotpannam ity arthaḥ |
vāmā dakṣinā ca nāḍī pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsonān yān ekaviṃśatisahasrān ṣaṭśatair adhikāṃs tān vahati |
tripakṣyadhikatrivarṣāṇi ca śatavarṣe pūrṇe vahati madhyamā |
vāmā savyā dakṣiṇordhve prāṇe yathākrameṇa saṃjñā candro'rkaś ca |  lalaneḍā cāpi piṅgalāpareti rasanā |
toyatejaḥsvabhāvinyāv iti pūrvavad yathākramaṃ padmadhṛgratnadhṛgmate'mitābharatnasaṃbhavādhidaivate |
adha ity apāne madhyamā nāḍī cetyādinā |
ūrdhve yā vāmanāḍī sādho madhyā viḍnāḍī |  ūrdhve yā dakṣiṇā sādho vāmā mūtravāhiṇī |
ete dve yathākramaṃ cakradhṛkkhaḍgadhṛgmate |  vairocanāmoghasiddhisvabhāve |
ūrdhve yā madhyamā (46)  sādhaḥ savyā śukravāhiṇī |
ete'pi śūnyajñānasvarūpe |
lagnād dakṣiṇalagnasaṃkrāntisaṃdhau madhyamā viṣuvaṃ vahati |  kati śvāsocchvāsān ity āha |
ṣaṭpañcāśad ityādi |
divāniśam ahorātre dvādaśasaṃkrāntau pañcasaptatyadhikaṣaṭśataśvāsān madhyamā vahati |
vāmadakṣiṇanāsāpuṭayor maṇḍalodayam āha |
vijñānādyam ityādi |

vijñānādyam ākāśādyaṃ sṛṣṭikrameṇa |  bhūmyādyaṃ saṃhārakrameṇa |  madhye madhyamāmārge ṣaṣṭhaṃ jñānamaṇḍalam ākāśādipañcamaṇḍalāt pratyekamaṇḍalasya sapādaikādaśaśvāsān gṛhītvā sapādaṣaṭpañcāśataśvāsātmakaṃ vahati |  āsāṃ vāmadakṣiṇamadhyanāḍīnām ahorātreṇa yathākramaṃ nābhipadme dvādaśadalātmake ṣaṣṭimaṇḍalāni |
ūrdhve prāṇe savyāvasavyayor vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ prajñopāyāṅgabhāvo'dho'pāne |  ūrdhvādho rajaḥśukrapravāhayoḥ | (47)
mṛtyoḥ kālasya śatavarṣe pūrṇe madhyamārohaṇaṃ samaviṣamadinair vṛṣādimeṣādyair janmajātaiś ca maṇḍalaiḥ pṛthivyādikaiḥ |
pakṣadvayavināśanād dakṣiṇavāmapakṣakṣayāt |
ariṣṭalakṣaṇam ityādi |
prāṇaṃ prāṇavāyuṃ lalāṭe nyaset |
yadi tat prakarśati na bhidyate |
maraṇaṃ tadaveśatas tayoḥ prāṇāpānavāyvor avadhūtyāṃ (57)  śaṅkhinyāṃ vāpraveśataḥ |
maraṇam eva |
śukretyādi |
uṣṇīṣāt sakāśād ūrṇāpaṅkaje bhrūmadhye śukrasyāgamanam ānandaṃ prathamam |
tasmāt kaṇṭhe hṛdi paramānandaṃ dvitīyam |
etad eva prapañcenāha |  śukram evendur amṛtatvāt | tasyodaya (59)

uṣṇīṣe lalāṭe pūrṇā prathamānandādibhedena śukrapratipad dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī lakṣaṇā |  uddeśamātreṇānūktatvāt |  kaṇṭhe hṛdaye ca ṣaṣṭhī saptamy aṣṭamī navamī daśamy aparā pūrṇā |  nābhau guhya ekādaśī dvādaśī trayodaśī caturdaśī pañcadaśī tṛtīyā pūrṇā |  athety ānandādibhedena tripūrṇā gate bodhicitte |
guhyapadmā tayā bodhicitte guhye gate paramānandād yā ṣoḍaśī kalā sā maṇipadme vajramūrdhnigā bhavati |
tasmād ūrdhvaṃ kṛṣṇapratipadāgame virāgapraveśakāle cyutikālaḥ syāt |
tato virāgato ravir ūrṇāsthānaṃ yāti |
asya sūryasya ṣoḍaśī kaloṣṇīṣakamale gatā saiva naṣṭacandra ity ākhyātaḥ |  sūryeṇa rajorūpeṇācchāditatvāt |
tato vividhaṃ ramaṇaṃ krīḍanagāḍhāliṅganaśītkāra kaṇṭhakūjanādilakṣaṇaṃ nābhau (58)  guhye ca gataṃ bodhicittaṃ viramānandaṃ tṛtīyam |
ato rāgasaukhyato viraktir bhavati |  atas tad varjanīyam |
maraṇe maraṇakāle sarvadehināṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ (60)
candrāmṛtaṃ bodhicittam |  adhaḥ śukramārgeṇa yāti |
sūrya eva rajo rajodharmitvād ūrdhve yāti |
guhyād vajramaṇiparyantam acyutaṃ bodhicittaṃ sahajānandaṃ caturtham |
tatra tathāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ pratiṣṭitayo rāgavirāgayor abhāvāt |  sāṃsārikarāgakṣayārtham |
mahārāgo vajrānañgo'kṣaraḥ prabhus traidhātuke vibhuḥ |  sarveṣāṃ tatpadavāñchayābhimatatvāt |
kiṃ punaḥ pratiṣṭhitanirvāṇam ity āha |  virāgād yad ityādi sugamam |
